cards.name: Red Keep Servant
cards.text: While you control a King's Landing location, Red Keep Servant gains an [intrigue] icon and cannot be bypassed by stealth.
cards.flavor: "It was well known that in the Red Keep the very walls have ears." <cite>The Queen of Thorns</cite>

cards.name: The King's Justice
cards.text: Unique character only. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel attached character to choose and kill a kneeling character controlled by the losing opponent.
cards.flavor: "If the wicked do not fear the King's Justice, you have put the wrong man in the office." <cite>Cersei Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Ralf the Limper
cards.text: Pillage. Shadow (5). Reaction: After a non-character card is discarded from an opponent's deck, choose a card you control with shadow and return it to shadows. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Swift Longship
cards.text: Shadow (0). Reaction: After Swift Longship comes out of shadows during a challenge, choose a defending character with printed STR 4 or lower. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge. +1 Initiative.

cards.name: The Imp's Agent
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which The Imp's Agent is participating, return it to shadows to have the losing opponent choose a card in their hand and place it on the top or bottom of their deck.

cards.name: Joffrey's Crossbow
cards.text:
If attached character is Joffrey Baratheon, he gains intimidate.
While attached character is attacking, unique characters must be chosen for [military] claim, if able.
cards.flavor: "The king is playing with his new crossbow" <cite>Tyrion Lannister</cite>

cards.name: Ghost Hill Elite
cards.text: Ambush (6). No attachments. Reaction: After Ghost Hill Elite enters play, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses an [intrigue] or [power] icon and Ghost Hill Elite gains that icon. Then, if that character has no challenge icons, kill it.

cards.name: A Toast to the King
cards.text: Play only if you control a [martell] Lord or Lady character. Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose an opponent and a challenge type. If that player does not control a character with a challenge icon of that type, they must satisfy the claim of that challenge type as if you were the winning opponent. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: Oathsworn Wildling
cards.text: If you do not control another Wildling character or Jon Snow, sacrifice Oathsworn Wildling.
cards.flavor: “Tormund has given me his oath. He will serve with us until the spring.” - Jon Snow

cards.name: The Black Gate
cards.text: Action: Kneel The Black Gate and sacrifice a [thenightswatch] character to put a character with equal or lower printed cost that shares a Trait with that character into play from your hand or shadows area.

cards.name: House Umber Berserkers
cards.text:
Assault. No attachments. Shadow (X).
X is the number of plot cards in your used pile (minimum of 1).
cards.flavor: “The Umbers may seem simple, but they are not without a certain low cunning” - Roose Bolton

cards.name: White Harbor Galley
cards.text: Shadow (1). While you are the attacking or defending player, each participating character gets +1 STR. Reaction: After White Harbor Galley comes out of shadows during a challenge in which you control a participating character, kneel a character you control to have it participate in the challenge on your side.

cards.name: Sorrowful Man
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Sorrowful Man comes out of shadows, switch a character in an opponent's discard pile with a character in that player's dead pile.

cards.name: Queen of Meereen
cards.text: Lady character only. Attached character gains the Queen trait. Action: Kneel Queen of Meereen to discard 1 or more cards from your hand. Reduce the cost of the next card you marshal, ambush, or bring out of shadows this phase by 2 for each card discarded this way.

cards.name: Horn Hill Vanguard
cards.text:
Assault. Intimidate. No attachments.
While Horn Hill Vanguard is attacking, it gets +1 STR for each standing [tyrell] character you control.
cards.flavor: "It takes more than a pretty cloak to charge a shield wall." <cite>Randyll Tarly</cite>

cards.name: Beneath the Petals
cards.text: Shadow (0). Action: Choose a character with shadow. Until the end of the phase, that character gains insight and a challenge icon of your choice. Interrupt: When Beneath the Petals is revealed from your deck, place it in shadows and gain 1 gold.

cards.name: Biter
cards.text: Intimidate. Reaction: After Biter kneels a character with a lower STR than his using intimidate, sacrifice him to kill that character.
cards.flavor: Half-healed burns covered his body, making him even more hideous than before.

cards.name: Reinstatement
cards.text: Standing Action: Kneel your faction card to put a Small Council character into play from your discard pile.
cards.flavor: “Someone has to rule this damnable kingdom. Put on the badge, Ned. It suits you.”- Robert Baratheon

cards.name: Striking at Dawn
cards.text: Each character's STR cannot be increased or reduced by card effects.
cards.flavor: “We shall see, brother. Come the dawn, we shall see.” - Stannis Baratheon

cards.name: The Small Council
cards.text: You may include non-loyal Small Council characters from any faction in your deck. You must include at least 7 different Small Council characters in your deck. Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a standing Small Council character you control and have it gain 1 power. Then, if you control a King or Queen character, draw 1 card.
